mapper.select: SELECT bd.seq_board, bd.seq_member, mb.member_name,mb.member_image_url, seq_group, seq_category, title, contents, read_count, tags, (select count(*) from wani.board_like bl where bd.seq_board = bl.seq_board and bl.use_yn = 'Y') as like_cnt, (select group_concat(image_url) as image_url from wani.board_image bi where bd.seq_board = bi.seq_board and bi.use_yn = 'Y') as image_url FROM wani.board bd inner join wani.member mb on bd.seq_member = mb.seq_member and mb.use_yn = 'Y' inner join wani.board_comment bc on bd.seq_board = bc.seq_board and bc.use_yn = 'Y' where bd.use_yn = 'Y' ;
